explanation: [0-0] Three people are lining up on the grass. A woman wearing a yellow hat, blue overalls, and a red top is adjusting her glasses with her right hand. Behind her stands a man in a black shirt and black shorts, also wearing a yellow hat. A woman in a black and white striped shirt and a long yellow skirt stands at the end of the line. Two emojis are displayed at the top of the screen: on the left, two people hugging, and on the right, a white bag with some banknotes.

[0-7] Next, a white frame with yellow subtitles appears. The three people run towards the right. The woman at the front runs to the camera, glances back, and exits to the right. The man behind her makes exaggerated expressions as he runs to the right. As the third woman runs right, three new people appear. At the front is a young man in a white shirt, black shorts, and a yellow hat. He runs to the camera, turns, and heads left. Then a woman in a black dress and the same hat appears, pouting as she runs left. Finally, a man in a gray top, black shorts, and a yellow hat also runs left.
